ins1:
Hello! Thank you for participating in the Pingolf task! 

Your goal is to get points by firing the ball so that it gets as close to the target as possible!
Bonus points for hitting the target!

Pull on the spring and let go to fire, but be quick!
You will not get any points if you take too long.

The next few trials are practice!
Try pulling the string at different lengths and different angles to see how it works!
ins2:
On to the real experiment! Now try to hit the target and increase your score! 
Pay attention to your environment, it may change and you may need to perform differently in different environments
ins3:
The environment will now change for the second phase of the experiment. 
Keep trying to hit the target!
ins4:
The environment will return to as it was at the first phase of the experiment. 
Perform as you did then, and keep trying to hit the target!
